verbs.description: [ARG1: An American] [V: held] [ARGM-LOC: in Venezuela] will return to the US Saturday evening , according to tweets by Utah Senator Orrin Hatch and President Donald Trump .
An American held in Venezuela [V: will] return to the US Saturday evening , according to tweets by Utah Senator Orrin Hatch and President Donald Trump .

[ARG1: An American held in Venezuela] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: return] [ARG4: to the US] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday evening] , [ARGM-ADV: according to tweets by Utah Senator Orrin Hatch and President Donald Trump] .
An American held in Venezuela will return to the US Saturday evening , [V: according] to tweets by Utah Senator Orrin Hatch and President Donald Trump .
